name: Tough Tongues
description:
TOUGH TONGUES is a 2 player local multiplayer game about angry tadpoles or frogs or I don't even know anymore, fighting to death. Show EVERYBODY who's the boss of the aquarium! Grab a controller with your friend and punch their wet little tails out with your hard as hell tongue!

Features:

  • Amazing one-controller local multiplayer tadpole controls
  • Killer froggy graphics by Maria Vilko
  • Slimey battle sound effects and music by Daniel Hagström
  • Tight amphibian gameplay by Jukio Kallio

And WOW! No limit on how many rounds you can play per match, so decide the winning number with your friend!

DISCLAIMER: you need one (1) controller to play this. Tested with an XBOX controller. Player 1 grabs the other side of the controller with one hand and Player 2 the other. Enjoy!

Made on the Global Game Jam 2015 weekend in cold winter torpor in Helsinki, Finland.
